import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; export default function AddCategory() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ 'title': '', 'description': '', 'testing': '', }); const handleChange = (eve) => { const name = eve.target.name; const value = eve.target.value; setInputs(values => ({ ...values, [name]: value })) } return (
) }
